dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...so like, wait, what was that whole airport thing about again?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so like, wait, what was that whole airport thing about again?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, you mean the Almaty airport incident? The one with the knife?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, you mean the Almaty airport incident? The one with the knife?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's the one! Like, someone got disarmed, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's the one! Like, someone got disarmed, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At a critical moment, another man in a brown T-shirt seized the opportunity, grabbed the knife from the attacker, and helped neutralize him, allowing law enforcement officers to detain him.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Mmm-hmm. March seventh, domestic terminal, around noon. Really wild, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mmm-hmm. March seventh, domestic terminal, around noon. Really wild, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The incident took place on March 7 at approximately 11:45 AM in the pre-flight security check area of the domestic terminal (T1).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Wild how? Was it, uh, a terrorist?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild how? Was it, uh, a terrorist?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Well, a disruptive man, let's say. Posing as a passenger. Grabbed a security officer, a woman, by her hair. Had a knife.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, a disruptive man, let's say. Posing as a passenger. Grabbed a security officer, a woman, by her hair. Had a knife.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A disruptive man posing as a passenger entered the checkpoint and, when asked to present his documents by aviation security staff, grabbed a female officer by the hair and threatened her with a knife.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god. And then what? Did someone, like, step in?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god. And then what? Did someone, like, step in?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. A passerby, first, offered to trade places as a hostage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. A passerby, first, offered to trade places as a hostage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During negotiations, a passerby offered to take the woman™s place as a hostage.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, offered to be a hostage? That's... intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, offered to be a hostage? That's... intense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah. But then, a second man, brown t-shirt, he saw his moment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah. But then, a second man, brown t-shirt, he saw his moment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At a critical moment, another man in a brown T-shirt seized the opportunity, grabbed the knife from the attacker, and helped neutralize him, allowing law enforcement officers to detain him.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: So he, uh, he just grabbed the knife? Like, out of nowhere?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So he, uh, he just grabbed the knife? Like, out of nowhere?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! Seized the opportunity, disarmed him. Helped get him neutralized so law enforcement could step in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! Seized the opportunity, disarmed him. Helped get him neutralized so law enforcement could step in.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At a critical moment, another man in a brown T-shirt seized the opportunity, grabbed the knife from the attacker, and helped neutralize him, allowing law enforcement officers to detain him.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. That's, uh, that's seriously brave. Who was that guy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. That's, uh, that's seriously brave. Who was that guy?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: His son, Aidos, said his dad was a Wushu-Sanda champion when he was younger.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: His son, Aidos, said his dad was a Wushu-Sanda champion when he was younger.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "My father was a Wushu-Sanda champion when he was younger. ...," said his son, Aidos.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And President Tokayev, he's actually ordered that guy, uh, a state honor for his bravery.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And President Tokayev, he's actually ordered that guy, uh, a state honor for his bravery.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recognizing the man’s bravery, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has ordered that he be awarded a state honor.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Good for him. I mean, wow. What a story, seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good for him. I mean, wow. What a story, seriously.
